forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 13 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco basks under a mostly sunny afternoon, the sun casting its gentle warmth over the skyline. Yet, there’s a coolness in the air, a reminder that nature’s touch remains ever-present. As the afternoon unfolds, temperatures will drift downwards towards the comforting embrace of 60 degrees. The west winds, brisk at around 21 mph, whisper through the streets, occasionally gusting, adding an invigorating edge to the day. Tonight, the clouds will softly roll in, cloaking the city in a blanket of gray, with temperatures dipping to a mild 53 degrees.

While the clarity of the day invites a stroll along the waterfront or a pleasant gathering in one of the city’s parks, be mindful of the swirling marine layer that often creeps in as evening approaches, obscuring the horizon and wrapping the hills in a veil of mist. Dress in layers: a light sweater coupled with a jacket will serve you well, ensuring comfort in the chill of the breeze and as the daylight wanes. Perhaps this evening, indulge in a leisurely dinner at a cozy bistro, allowing the flavorful embrace of a warm meal to offset the cool night air.
